SalesTransactionFulfillReq.name: SalesTransactionFulfillReq
SalesTransactionFulfillReq.description: Represents the statuses of all the sub-orders that belong to the selected commercial or technical product.

AssetizationStatus.description: Specifies the status of the assetization.

DecompositionStatus.description: Specifies the status of the decomposition.

Name.description: The name of the sales transaction fulfillment request.

OrchestrationGroupKey.description: The identifier of the group of sales transactions that require synchronization before processing. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the request record.

PlanExecutionStatus.description: Specifies the status of the plan execution.

PreviousRequestId.description: The identifier of the previous fulfillment request.

ReferenceObjectIdentifier.description: The ID of the sales transaction record. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later.

SalesTransactionType.description: Specifies the type of sales transaction that's processed by the fulfillment request.

Status.description: Specifies the overall status of the fulfillment.
